title: Ep 116: Josh is a Landlord
description:
In This Episode: A couple of cousins get a little too close at a meetup, a sorority starts a union amongst its party going members, a listener gives their grandmother a heart attack, and a couple asks if they're the baddies for having strict rules about visitation of their kid. Josh also gets a birthday present and becomes lord of a land and we go over our bms for June.
Use code JUDGIES at Betterhelp.com to get 10% off your first month.

Get Judgies Merch Here:
https://store.streamelements.com/judgiespod

Our Patreon is officially open, if you want to see extra content go check it out! 
https://www.patreon.com/JudgiesPod 

Send us mail! (Addressed However You'd Like)
 P.O. Box 58 Ottawa, IL 61350 

Leave a Review! 
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-judgies/id1519741238 

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/judgiespod
Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/judgiespod 

Intro Music by: Iván 
https://open.spotify.com/artist/5gB2VvyqfnOlNv37PHKRNJ?si=f6TIYrLITkG2NZXGLm_Y-Q&dl_branch=1 

Story Links:
Younger Cousin Crush: Deleted
Unionization: Deleted
Rule Bending

Time Stamps:
0:00 Intro
1:45 Mail Time
10:16 Review :)
11:17 My Cousin is into Me
18:39 Organizing a Union
28:46 Break
29:15 June Bathroom Trips
35:32 LS: Grandma Heart Attack
47:37 AITA: Rule Bending
58:14 Outro
